title: Mock Draft Monday: Draft Pick Value Chart, NFC/AFC South Team Needs (Football 4/6)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by draft experts Ryan Wilson and R.J. White for the latest edition of 'Mock Draft Monday'. First, the guys address the growing possibility that the draft is entirely conducted from home and what impact that may have on the selection process (8:00). Next, a look at R.J.'s draft pick value chart when it comes to trades teams are considering (16:30). What would it take for the Dolphins to trade up to #2 or the Jaguars to trade up to #3? Then, Will, Ryan and R.J. address the biggest needs and potential fits for all NFC South teams: Panthers (34:15), Bucs (38:30), Falcons (41:30), Saints (43:30). That's followed by analysis of the AFC South: Jaguars (46:00), Titans (49:30), Colts (52:00), Texans (55:30).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @RyanWilson, @rjwhite1
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
